title: 09/06/2021 - HOUR 3 - UCLA, Urban Meyer, Playoff or Takeoff
itunes:title: 09/06/2021 - HOUR 3 - UCLA, Urban Meyer, Playoff or Takeoff
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, former NFL player, pro scout and current FOX Sports Radio host Bucky Brooks joins Colin to discuss UCLA's dominant line play, the NFL's Week 1 matchups of intrigue and Jaguar head coach Urban Meyer's upcoming Jacksonville debut. Finally, an NFL Week 1 edition of Playoff or Takeoff. 


Guest: Bucky Brooks

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
